site_name: 1-8 INC Neville House & Neville House Garages, Neville Road, 1-64 INC Winterleys and Seahorse Day Nursery, Albert Road, 113-128 Carlton House and Carlton House Hall, Canterbury Terrace  London, NW6
description: Non-material amendment of Variation of Conditions reference 23/1935 of Variation of conditions 2 (approved drawings and documents), 18 (compliance with approved noise assessment), 31 (communal television system/satellite dishes), 32 (photovoltaic panel arrays on the roofs), 37 (affordable housing), 38 (private residential), 41 (landscaping including tree planting) and 43 (child play equipment) of Deemed (Reg4 Councils Other Development) reference 18/4920 dated 3 July, 2020, with later NMA to vary Description under reference 23/2116 for Demolition of all existing buildings and erection of a part six, nine, ten and twelve storey building arranged around a courtyard (Western Building) providing residential units and a part four, five, eight, nine and ten storey L-shaped building (Eastern Building) providing residential units. The provision of a pedestrian and cycle shared surface along Neville Road, with associated cycle provision, bin stores, landscaping and ancillary works (Revised Description).ÿThe amendments hereby proposed comprise of the following amendments to the western block:ÿEnclose the entrancewaysFilling in four indents to the footprintRemoval of secondary staircaseInstallation of upper floor screening adjacent to lifts in Core DAlterations to cycle parking layoutAlteration to private unit mixUpdate the wording of condition 37 to reflect the updated unit mix
